recipesJson.name: Minty Down Under
recipesJson.author: Rageisalotofwork
recipesJson.description:
One drop INW Natural Mint per 10ml-15ml (10 if you a really heavy menthol vaper).

This is a mint chocolate chip ice cream recipe I've been working on for a while now. I've tried a lot of mint chocolate flavored recipes, and they all taste like mint, so I've been slaving over this one to get it right. I switched to Hangsen Australian chocolate and Inw Natural Mint and found a balance I like.

reviews.text: I mentioned in V2 that I hate Chocolate vapes, I do not hate this one, is good. For a better version try his V2.
